content: I do not have access to the specific research or consultation conducted by the development team of shrek. however, it is known that the filmmakers of shrek aimed to create a fairy tale world that was both familiar and unexpected, drawing inspiration from various fairy tale stories and settings. the team also consulted with various experts, such as child psychologists and fairy tale scholars, to ensure that the film was appropriate for all audiences and stayed true to the original fairy tale genre. additionally, the development team incorporated contemporary references and humor into the film to appeal to modern audiences.
